_header: My woeful heart thus clad in pain
Subjects: women, as speakers/narrators; lovers absence/separation of
_description: A Love song of a mistress for her absent lover — seven 3-line stanzas, aab, with the same rhyme throughout

CULFf16.First Lines:
My woo full hert thus cald in paynWote natt welle what do nor
                    seynlong absens greuyth me soffor lakke of syght nere am y
                    sleyn…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…My hertt shall I neuer ffro hym refraynI gaue hitt hym with
                    owte constraynEuyr to contenwe so
